investorBriefingTopics: ADU Market TAM: $19.65B current, $47.34B by 2035 (9.19% CAGR)

Massachusetts ADU validation: 25% of new housing, 1,224 permits in 2025, 48% detached
AI in construction: 2025 breakthrough year, 30% task automation potential
Construction AI funding: $41M FYLD Series B shows investor confidence, 82% growth
Housing deficit crisis: 4.7M unit shortage driving industrial building system adoption
Modular construction surge: 12%+ annual growth, 50% faster delivery than traditional
Construction supply response: 500K+ rental units completed, 73% affordable housing growth
Policy-driven growth: Massachusetts legislative push for 900 sq ft ADU baseline
Technology validation: 60% of new industrial builds using robotic fabrication
Labor shortage solution: Factory automation bypassing skilled worker shortage
Market timing: Early-mover advantage before mainstream AI adoption wave
